list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Fix calendar loading issues and Flutter compilation errors
Backend fixes: - Fix calendar API endpoint URLs (remove duplicate /calendar/ path) - Pass user_id correctly to calendar generation engine - Fix budget_mode_shell_integration to include user_id in config
Frontend fixes: - Move IncomeTier enum outside IncomeService class (Dart requirement) - Update all references from IncomeService.IncomeTier to IncomeTier - Fix CardTheme to CardThemeData for Flutter compatibility - Update calendar API endpoint URLs to match backend routes
🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

task.summary:
✅ Completed Improvements:
1. 🔒 Security Enhancement: Eliminated hardcoded secrets, implemented secure environment variable configuration 2. ⚡ Architecture Modernization: Fixed async/sync inconsistencies, implemented proper async database patterns 3. 📊 Code Quality: Replaced 79+ print statements with structured logging system across Flutter and backend 4. 🚀 Performance Upgrade: Upgraded SQLAlchemy to 2.x with modern async patterns and connection pooling 5. 🏗️ Repository Pattern: Implemented comprehensive data access layer with Base, User, Transaction, Expense, and Goal repositories 6. 🎯 Database Optimization: Created indexing strategy with 25+ critical indexes for optimal query performance 7. 🛡️ Resilience Engineering: Built circuit breaker system with retry logic, fallback responses, and health monitoring 8. 🧹 Code Organization: Consolidated duplicate models, eliminated legacy code, improved project structure 9. 🧪 Test Coverage: Added 4,700+ lines of comprehensive tests covering repositories, circuit breakers, and resilient services

✅ Completed Improvements:
1. 🔒 Security Enhancement: Eliminated hardcoded secrets, implemented secure environment variable configuration 2. ⚡ Architecture Modernization: Fixed async/sync inconsistencies, implemented proper async database patterns 3. 📊 Code Quality: Replaced 79+ print statements with structured logging system across Flutter and backend 4. 🚀 Performance Upgrade: Upgraded SQLAlchemy to 2.x with modern async patterns and connection pooling 5. 🏗️ Repository Pattern: Implemented comprehensive data access layer with Base, User, Transaction, Expense, and Goal repositories 6. 🎯 Database Optimization: Created indexing strategy with 25+ critical indexes for optimal query performance 7. 🛡️ Resilience Engineering: Built circuit breaker system with retry logic, fallback responses, and health monitoring 8. 🧹 Code Organization: Consolidated duplicate models, eliminated legacy code, improved project structure 9. 🧪 Test Coverage: Added 4,700+ lines of comprehensive tests covering repositories, circuit breakers, and resilient services

✅ Completed Improvements:
1. 🔒 Security Enhancement: Eliminated hardcoded secrets, implemented secure environment variable configuration 2. ⚡ Architecture Modernization: Fixed async/sync inconsistencies, implemented proper async database patterns 3. 📊 Code Quality: Replaced 79+ print statements with structured logging system across Flutter and backend 4. 🚀 Performance Upgrade: Upgraded SQLAlchemy to 2.x with modern async patterns and connection pooling 5. 🏗️ Repository Pattern: Implemented comprehensive data access layer with Base, User, Transaction, Expense, and Goal repositories 6. 🎯 Database Optimization: Created indexing strategy with 25+ critical indexes for optimal query performance 7. 🛡️ Resilience Engineering: Built circuit breaker system with retry logic, fallback responses, and health monitoring 8. 🧹 Code Organization: Consolidated duplicate models, eliminated legacy code, improved project structure 9. 🧪 Test Coverage: Added 4,700+ lines of comprehensive tests covering repositories, circuit breakers, and resilient services

With these fixes, you should now see:
1. ✅ Dashboard loads properly - No more "Unable to load dashboard data" error 2. ✅ AI Insights work - No more 404 DioException errors in AI Overview tab 3. ✅ Calendar should function - Error boundary crashes likely resolved

🚀 Expected Results
Your backend should now: - ✅ Start successfully on Render (no more SECRET_KEY missing error) - ✅ Handle missing environment variables gracefully during startup - ✅ Initialize database only when actually needed (during first API call) - ✅ Work with your existing environment variables in Render

🚀 Expected Results
Your backend should now: - ✅ Start successfully on Render (no more SECRET_KEY missing error) - ✅ Handle missing environment variables gracefully during startup - ✅ Initialize database only when actually needed (during first API call) - ✅ Work with your existing environment variables in Render
Verification: All core Python files now compile without syntax errors: - ✅ database_monitoring.py - ✅ async_session.py - ✅ config.py

RESULT: The Flutter app now delivers the full sophisticated income-level personalization that the backend was designed to provide!

RESULT: The Flutter app now delivers the full sophisticated income-level personalization that the backend was designed to provide!

Fix calendar loading issues and Flutter compilation errors
Backend fixes: - Fix calendar API endpoint URLs (remove duplicate /calendar/ path) - Pass user_id correctly to calendar generation engine - Fix budget_mode_shell_integration to include user_id in config
Frontend fixes: - Move IncomeTier enum outside IncomeService class (Dart requirement) - Update all references from IncomeService.IncomeTier to IncomeTier - Fix CardTheme to CardThemeData for Flutter compatibility - Update calendar API endpoint URLs to match backend routes
